        symbs - Symbols used to represent the Hero

      • update

        public void update(GameMap gameMap,
                   int row,
                   int col)
        Function responsible for updating the hero position in the given map, to the position (row, col). The position of the hero is dependent of gameMap characteristics.
        Overrides:
        update in class GameCharacter
        Parameters:
        gameMap - Map used for updating hero position
        row - row of the Matrix to be updated
        col - col of the Matrix to be updated
        See Also:
        GameCharacter.update(dkeep.logic.GameMap, int, int)

      • keyFoundStatus

        public void keyFoundStatus(boolean status)
        Hero symbol gets updated. Updates hasKey, if Hero finds key.
        Parameters:
        status - boolean. IF set, hero found key, otherwise did not.

      • hasKey

        public boolean hasKey()
        Returns:
        true if Hero has key, false otherwise.
